messages.title: System queries can be separated into two types of queries:

messages.speech: System queries are queries which are generated by the system. 🤖

One of the advantages of using Electronic Data Capture is that there are automatic 'checks' built into the system. Once Save is clicked, the data will be saved and the system will look for any discrepancies (including missing data).

If any errors are found, the record will turn 𝗽𝗶𝗻𝗸 and the query text "Opened to System" will appear. The person entering data is automatically alerted to data discrepancies. The query will also appear on your Task Summary under 'Open Queries'.
